FuncDef:
The reset rip statistics command clears statistics maintained by a particular RIP process.
The reset ripng statistics command clears statistics about a specific RIPng process. The reset rip statistics command clears statistics maintained by a particular RIP process. The reset ripng statistics command clears statistics about a specific RIPng process.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about the ABR or ASBR of an OSPF route in a specified OSPF process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Clears statistics about a specified interface.
-

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Clears statistics about RIP exchanges with a neighbor.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo: To clear statistics about the specified or all processes, run the reset the command in the user view. The command output helps you repeatedly record statistics during debugging.
